body.name: ASTERWOOD Moisturizer Face Cream with Hyaluronic Acid - Anti-Aging, Anti-Wrinkle, Hydrating for Dry Skin - Facial Moisturizer for Women & Men - Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic - 1.7 oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 55 mins
features: Long-Lasting Hydration: This hyaluronic acid moisturizer offers deep, lasting hydration and nourishment. Suitable as a face moisturizer for dry skin, it aids in moisture retention, leaving your skin smooth, plump, & revitalized.

Anti-Aging Benefits: Enriched with 1000 PPM of hyaluronic acid, this moisturizer for face not only hydrates but also helps reduce fine lines. It's an ideal anti-aging face cream, night cream, & wrinkle cream for women & men seeking a youthful glow.

Soothing for Irritated Skin: Beyond hydration, our moisturizer works wonders on irritated or sensitive skin. Its soothing properties make it an ideal choice for those looking for a gentle, non-comedogenic face moisturizer.

Dual Daily Hydration: Ideal as a day & night moisturizer, this hyaluronic acid moisturizer is designed for twice daily use to provide your skin with hydration. It's a perfect choice for a daily moisturizer for face, ensuring 24-hour skin nourishment.

Gentle and Safe Formula: Hypoallergenic and free from animal testing, parabens, sulfates, phthalates, and gluten. This vegan moisturizer is safe for all skin types, including sensitive skin, making it an excellent face moisturizer for women and men.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is not like any other serum. It goes on smooth isn’t slimy isn’t overly tacky. No smell, great price and seeing great hydration improvement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and effective product
reviews.reviewText: I love the idea of this brand - simple and affordable products. This HA was easily absorbed and made my skin feel hydrated. I use this before my moisturiser day and night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and thick
reviews.reviewText: This serum is great! I had a previous serum from a different company that I liked until they changed the formula that was so thin I swore it was only water. I then switched to Asterwood Pure Hyaluronic Acid Serumand it was like night and day!! Love the way that if you want you can dispense out a drop or two at a time you can, unless you want the whole dropper full a time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very good HA. Does what it’s intended for. No scent. Love the results. Will purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I noticed my skin react positively immediately!
reviews.reviewText: I’m a regular Hyaluronic Acid user and I look for it in the skin care I purchase. So when searching I came across this particular brand and read some reviews and also noted that it’s ingredients are very clean. The less chemicals I use on my body as I get older and more sensitive skin issues the better. And my skin reacts quickly as I get older!I immediately started using it and one thing I noticed almost immediately was my pores on my face reacted immediately to the serium along with the fine lines I have. That response alone was enough to make me review this product! I usually review products when I’m disappointed in the results! Another plus is my facial redness has decreased significantly. I use it morning and nightly and under my makeup because it blurs my pores and fine lines so my makeup doesn’t settle in them. The best serum I’ve used so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love
reviews.reviewText: I was a little skeptical but after using this for a few weeks, I can see a noticeable difference in the fine lines- specifically crows feet & upper lip. I now use it nightly followed by a good moisturizer. Just a few seconds to apply.. Beauty products that actually work are usually so expensive! It’s great to find one this reasonably priced that works! Will definitely continue to use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars More watery than expected
reviews.reviewText: I am used to the thickness of HA serum by the ordinary and this is definitely not on the same level. It still is nice, comes as described, but is not thick enough for my taste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This little child of mine.....
reviews.reviewText: The Holy Grail hidden in plain sight. Just what I was looking for. Not all Hyaluronic Acid is made the same. this bottle is a miracle for my skin. I wash, air dry my face then apply my favorite moisturizer on top. You can also use this to stamp your face as the product is not greasy, nor thick. It applies smoothly on the face and dries nice. I was not surprised though when I read where it was produced at. None other than Beverly Hills, CA. Enough said for me anyway. Try this bottle it is a keeper.

reviews.reviewTitle: Que no debieran permitir precios tan altísimos.
reviews.reviewText: El producto ya lo he usado, pero desafortunadamente lo compraba en EU. Pero con la contingencia no se puede pasar , me dió gusto encontrarlo pero el precio fue altísimo.
Perfect for dry skin, extremely good
El producto llegó en buenas condiciones, ya llevo usándolo casi dos meses y los resultados son evidentes, la piel se ve más tersa y firme
